tests.title: The cryptosuite property of the proof MUST be bbs-2023.

cell.rowId: The cryptosuite property of the proof MUST be bbs-2023.

tests.title: The type property of the proof MUST be DataIntegrityProof.

cell.rowId: The type property of the proof MUST be DataIntegrityProof.

tests.title: The value of the proofValue property of the proof MUST be a BBS signature or BBS proof produced according to [CFRG-BBS-SIGNATURE] that is serialized and encoded according to procedures in section 3. Algorithms.

cell.rowId: The value of the proofValue property of the proof MUST be a BBS signature or BBS proof produced according to [CFRG-BBS-SIGNATURE] that is serialized and encoded according to procedures in section 3. Algorithms.

tests.title: The derived "proof" MUST verify when using a conformant verifier.

cell.rowId: The derived "proof" MUST verify when using a conformant verifier.

tests.title: The "proof.proofPurpose" field MUST match the verification relationship expressed by the verification method controller.
The verificationMethod property of the proof MUST be a URL.

cell.rowId: The verificationMethod property of the proof MUST be a URL.

tests.title: Dereferencing "verificationMethod" MUST result in an object containing a type property with "Multikey" value.

cell.rowId: Dereferencing "verificationMethod" MUST result in an object containing a type property with "Multikey" value.

tests.title: The publicKeyMultibase property represents a Multibase-encoded Multikey expression of a BLS12-381 public key in the G2 group. The encoding of this field is the two-byte prefix 0xeb01 followed by the 96-byte compressed public key data. The 98-byte value is then encoded using base58-btc (z) as the prefix. Any other encodings MUST NOT be allowed.

cell.rowId: The publicKeyMultibase property represents a Multibase-encoded Multikey expression of a BLS12-381 public key in the G2 group. The encoding of this field is the two-byte prefix 0xeb01 followed by the 96-byte compressed public key data. The 98-byte value is then encoded using base58-btc (z) as the prefix. Any other encodings MUST NOT be allowed.

tests.title: The transformation options MUST contain a type identifier for the cryptographic suite (type), a cryptosuite identifier (cryptosuite), and a verification method (verificationMethod).

cell.rowId: The transformation options MUST contain a type identifier for the cryptographic suite (type), a cryptosuite identifier (cryptosuite), and a verification method (verificationMethod).

tests.title: the HMAC key MUST be the same length as the digest size

cell.rowId: the HMAC key MUST be the same length as the digest size

tests.title: CBOR-encode components per [RFC8949] where CBOR tagging MUST NOT be used on any of the components. Append the produced encoded value to proofValue.

cell.rowId: CBOR-encode components per [RFC8949] where CBOR tagging MUST NOT be used on any of the components. Append the produced encoded value to proofValue.
